metadata.name: ! Isaac Ultra Dark Mode [Rep+]
metadata.description:
Changes all the main menu graphics to be more darker your eyes will thank you.
[h1] Features [/h1] [list] [*]Makes all the menu graphics darker [*]Intro movie has also been changed [*]Stops you getting blind [/list]
[h1] List Below of mods that need to have a patch manually installed [/h1] Scroll down if you need help on how to as i have the files included. Note you still need the original mod. [table] [h2] [tr] [th]Manual Install[/th] [th]Yes / No[/th] [/tr] [tr] [td] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2769063897] [REP+] Unintrusive Pause Menu[/url][/td] [td]Yes[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3386788715] Yet Another Portraits Mod[/url] [/td] [td]Yes[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2622566172] Visible Challenge Unlocks[/url] [/td] [td]No[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1385718988] Wider Mods Menu[/url] [/td] [td]No[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3345262813] 100% Accurate Character Select[/url] [/td] [td]No[/td] [/tr] [/h2] [/table]
The mods tagged no mean you just have to be subscribed on steam nothing else
The mods tagged yes means you need to drag and drop a folder below is a step by step If you need help feel free to message. I will make a short video and add it here at somepoint. [list] [*]Step 1. Go to C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\The Binding of Isaac Rebirth\mods\! isaac ultra dark mode OR you can right click Binding of issac in steam > Browse Local Files mods > ! isaac ultra dark mode [rep+] [*]Step 2. Patches and Fixes [*]Step 3. Yet Another Portraits [*]Step 4. Copy the resources file [*]Step 5. Go back to my main folder the one with the metadata.xml [*]Step 6. Paste the resources [*]Step 7. If promted to replace do so. [/list]
Feel Free to let me know if you find any conflicts
